title: (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2011 (No. 23 of 2011)) of the Courts of Justice
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the District Court (Fees) (Amendment)
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the District Court (Fees) (Amendment) 

(No.2) Order 2022. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 28 September 2022.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited district court (fees) (amendment) (no.2) order 2022 (2) order come operation 28 september 2022

title: (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2011 (No. 23 of 2011)) of the Courts of Justice
heading: 2. The District Court (Fees) Order 2014 (S.I. No. 22 of 2014) is amended,
text_raw:
2. The District Court (Fees) Order 2014 (S.I. No. 22 of 2014) is amended, 
in Column (2) of Part 4 of the Schedule, at reference number 7, by the 
substitution of “€150” for “€300”. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 30th September, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The Minister for Public Expenditure and Reform consents to the making of the 
foregoing Order. 

[479] 3 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Minister for Public 
Expenditure and Reform 
27 September, 2022. 

MICHAEL MCGRATH, 

Minister for Public Expenditure and Reform. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

27 September, 2022. 

HELEN MCENTEE, 
Minister for Justice. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [479]
